PreToolUse.hook: node -e "const f = process.env.CLAUDE_FILE_PATH || ''; if (f.includes('.env')) { console.log('BLOCK: Do not edit .env files - they contain API keys'); process.exit(2); }"
PreToolUse.description: Block edits to .env files (contain Supabase API keys)

PreToolUse.hook: node -e "const f = process.env.CLAUDE_FILE_PATH || ''; if (f.match(/package-lock\.json|pnpm-lock\.yaml|yarn\.lock/)) { console.log('BLOCK: Do not edit lock files directly'); process.exit(2); }"
PreToolUse.description: Block direct edits to lock files
